abstract: Boston Journal; Bostonians, emerging from snowiest winter in city's history, prepare to host the 119th Boston Marathon; event has taken on double resonance since 2013 bombings, emerging as an occasion for both solemn remembrance and joyful celebration; this year's marathon bears added layer of complexity, arriving during trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who has been convicted on 30 counts in relation to bombing.
lead_paragraph: Since the bombings two years ago that killed three spectators, the Boston Marathon has become a two-tiered occasion, a time for the city to rejoice in the race while honoring the victims and survivors.

headline.main: Celebrating Boston Marathon, While Honoring Victims’ Memory
headline.print_headline: Celebrating a Beloved Marathon While Honoring Bombings’ Victims

snippet: Since the bombings two years ago that killed three spectators, the Boston Marathon has become a two-tiered occasion, a time for the city to rejoice in the race while honoring the victims and survivors.
